body_html:
I am able to download the pkgs.fedoraproject.org NASM mirror. Just to clarify, is the reason we want to replace it because it is not reliable (and not that is doesnt work at all)?

And Option 1 should be work. Looks like some deepmind project has Bazel handle a tar.xz archive...
https://github.com/deepmind/lab/blob/master/WORKSPACE#L28

I am able to download the pkgs.fedoraproject.org NASM mirror. Just to clarify, is the reason we want to replace it because it is not reliable (and not that is doesnt work at all)?

And Option 1 should be work. Looks like some deepmind project has Bazel handle a tar.xz archive...
